comments:
Problem with CrossRefence. Trying to find cross references in a Model I get this
exception.

java.lang.NullPointerException
    at org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil.isAncestor(EcoreUtil.java:699)
    at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$ExternalCrossReferencer.crossReference(EcoreUtil.java:1207)
    at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$CrossReferencer.handleCrossReference(EcoreUtil.java:1016)
    at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$CrossReferencer.crossReference(EcoreUtil.java:998)
    at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$ExternalCrossReferencer.findExternalCrossReferences(EcoreUtil.java:1216)
    at
org.eclipse.emf.ecore.util.EcoreUtil$ExternalCrossReferencer.find(EcoreUtil.java:1238)

I think that the problem comes when I have a Property, that is a member end in
an association, with no Type.
This is fixed in build I200502181408.
